hasDitaContent.@value: Tetracycline increases the risk of bleeding events when given with acenocoumarol. Manufacturer advises monitor INR.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Tetracycline   increases   the risk of bleeding events when given with   acenocoumarol .  Manufacturer advises monitor INR .

hasDitaContent.@value: Acitretin increases the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with tetracycline. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Acitretin   increases   the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with   tetracycline .  Manufacturer advises avoid .
